title: Delete a Remote Branch
description: In Git, a branch is a lightweight movable pointer to a commit. Branches are used to develop features, isolate changes, and experiment without affecting other parts of the repository. Remote branches are references to the state of branches on remote repositories. They are used to keep track of the progress of other developers' work and to collaborate on projects.

meta.title: Deleting Remote Branches in Git
meta.description: Learn how to delete remote branches in Git, a crucial skill for maintaining a clean and organized repository.
meta.keywords: repository, delete, git labs, git, collaboration, git playground, remote branch

verify.name: Verify for successful deletion
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
